name: Catalpa
description:
Hi, thanks for playing our game.

In this game you pilot a futuristic ship through a gorgeous canion and abbandoned ruins infested by gigantic worms.
We really whanted to make you feel as small as possible in these enormous environments
It was our very first jam in 3D so we decided to have a pretty small scope to be shure that we woud be able to finish the game and integrate all the 3D assets.

Controls :You controll your ship with the keyboard arrows

At any time you can press "A" to invert the Y axis
At any time you can press "Escape" to go back to the menu and restart

Known Bugs
you might get stuck in some walls, in that case we are sorry but you will have to restart the game, luckily it isn't that long ;).

MacOS version and Linux version are untested so they might have some bugs we are not aware of sorry :/

Credits:

BASSET Samuel: Programming

DUCROCQ Hugo : 3D Art & Animations

AUVRAY Hadrien: Sound Design & Level Design

LETANG Vincent: 3D Art & World Building

RIZKALLAH André: 3D Art
